DOC.brief_summary: The study clinically evaluate currently market contact lens use extend wear modality seven days/six night .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Several Contact Lenses Extended Wear
DOC.criteria: Be legal age , 18 39 year age . Signed Written Informed Consent Investigator record Case Report Form ( CRF ) appropriate space . Require visual correction eye ( Monovision allow ) Require soft contact lens spherical correction 0.50 9.00D . Have astigmatic correction le 1.50D eye . Be able wear lens power available study . Be able regularly wear lenses 7 day/6 night extend wear basis ( e.g . regularly swim week ) Be correctable visual acuity 20/30 good eye . Have normal eye evidence abnormality disease . For purpose study normal eye define one : No amblyopia . No evidence lid abnormality infection . No clinically significant slit lamp find No active ocular disease . No previous ocular surgery . Requires concurrent ocular medication . Any systemic illness would contraindicate lens wear medical treatment would affect vision successful lens wear . No Clinically significant ( Grade 3 4 ) slit lamp finding include corneal edema , corneal vascularization , corneal staining , tarsal abnormality , bulbar injection , abnormality cornea would contraindicate contact lens wear . Diabetic . Infectious disease ( e.g. , hepatitis , tuberculosis ) immunosuppressive disease ( e.g. , HIV ) . PMMA RGP lens wear previous 8 week . Has refractive surgery . Has eye injury/surgery within 8 week immediately prior enrolment study . Abnormal lacrimal secretion . Preexisting ocular irritation would preclude contact lens fit . Keratoconus corneal irregularity . Pregnancy , lactate plan pregnancy time enrollment . Participation concurrent clinical trial .
